attributes.name: Magister's Ethereal Boots
attributes.description: "Existence on this plane is fleeting."
attributes.parsed_description: "Existence on this plane is fleeting."

attributes.description: An amulet with an embedded malachite gem.

attributes.name: Malchezar's Legguards
attributes.description: "The great Malchezar was as fine a warrior as he was a mage. Beneath his flowing robes he lined himself with coldforged steel that protected him until he died of old age."
attributes.parsed_description: "The great Malchezar was as fine a warrior as he was a mage. Beneath his flowing robes he lined himself with coldforged steel that protected him until he died of old age."

attributes.name: Malevolent Defender
attributes.description: "While nature is quite adept at reclaiming things lost to time, it is more efficient to not lose them in the first place."
attributes.parsed_description: "While nature is quite adept at reclaiming things lost to time, it is more efficient to not lose them in the first place."

attributes.name: Mangled Heart
attributes.description: "His heart was in the right place. Unfortunately, it was hard to tell it was a heart after everything was said and done."
attributes.parsed_description: "His heart was in the right place. Unfortunately, it was hard to tell it was a heart after everything was said and done."

attributes.name: Marauder Band
attributes.description: A ring given to you by a member of the Marauders. It bears an inscription: "Join us in victory!"
